channel.title: Chuck Mangione on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Chuck Mangione on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Chuck Mangione, Jazz Musician Whose ‘Feels So Good’ Stormed the Pop Top 10 in the Late ’70s, Dies at 84
item.description: Jazz musician Chuck Mangione, who had one of the biggest pop-jazz instrumental crossover hits of all time with “Feels So Good” in the 1970s, died Tuesday at age 84. The death was reported
